mapper.sql: SELECT u1.id, u1.create_time, u1.update_time, u1.delete_time, u1.state, r1.name AS orderer_name, r2.name AS receiver_name, u1.question, u1.order_phone, u1.feedback_id FROM user_feedback u1 LEFT JOIN user_info r1 ON u1.orderer=r1.id LEFT JOIN user_info r2 ON u1.receiver=r2.id
mapper.update: UPDATE user_feedback SET state=#{state} WHERE id=#{id}
